thread.title: Patrice
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Patrice

author: Patrice
title: Patrice
text: I've used American Frame now for over 5 years. I'm an artist and wanted to try framing my own work to save money. Their website makes it easy to measure and use their products. Once the kit arrives, it's easy to assemble. Their large choices of frames, mat boards and other supplies allows me to create frames for all my artwork.
